document.full_text: residents of tushka, okla., fled to an underground shelter to escape a tornado that reduced a school building to little more than rubble and killed 17 people in four states.
document.title: tornado damages oklahoma school, but shelter beneath stands strong
lines_and_colors: residents of tushka, okla., fled to an underground shelter to escape a tornado that reduced a school building to little more than rubble and killed 17 people in four states.
